[Note]  It is difficult to classify the health hazards of toluidine salts, because many substances can categorise as toluidine salts and they have different properties. Also refer to the toluidine (ID No.0606, CAS No.26915-12-8) which is the parent compound  , and its isomeric ortho body (ID No.0043, CAS No.95-53-4), meta body (ID No.0607, CAS No.108-44-1) and para body (ID No.0044, CAS No.106-49-0).
